title: Manage a Batch Job
description: This workflow use Step Functions to trigger a notification on success or failure of a batch job (AWS Batch, Amazon SNS)

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This sample project demonstrates how to submit an AWS Batch job, and then send an Amazon SNS notification based on whether that job succeeds or fails. Deploying this sample project creates an AWS Step Functions state machine, an AWS Batch job, and an Amazon SNS topic.

testing.headline: Testing
text: See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.
